document_data.name: Gem Tracer
document_data.mainbody: '''''Gem tracer''''' was a powerful spell commonly used by [[dragon]]s.
document_data.Effects: This spell was used to create a permanent link to an object or item by using a [[Spell focus|focus]]. The focus acted like a ''[[locate object]]'' spell but with unlimited range. It also allowed the creature holding the focus to ''[[Scrying (spell)|scry]]'' the enspelled object.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, this spell required a focus, a [[gem]] with a value of 100 [[gp]] or more.
document_data.History: According to legend, this spell was created by the dragon whose hoard was first raided.
